about_the_game:
Think fast and kill even faster, as you fight against hordes of bloodthirsty enemies.
Demons, abominations, challenging bossfights, violence and intense fast-paced action. That is what Two Sides of Hell has to offer, in highly engaging procedurally generated levels.

Two Sides of Hell is a roguelite action platformer that combines the best of the action and roguelite genres, creating uniquely fun and captivating gameplay.
It's a breath of fresh air from the traditional modern gameplay experience, with an original twin-stick & no-mouse-required gameplay that goes back to the roots of video game history.



Game Features:
  • Procedural levels, to keep the experience fresh at each run
  • Unique enemies, each with their own unique combat style
  • Multiple endings, based on your play style and decisions that you take during each run
  • Intense bossfights, to add some extra spice to the challenge
  • Permanent armory and gear upgrades, to adapt your character's build to your play style
  • A big selection of deadly weapons and accessories, because more is better
  • Power-Up consumables (Power Plates) that give a bump to your stats and special abilities



Plot:
The battlezone was a peaceful planet where astronauts and researchers of the BFA built their military camp, as they discovered a new form of intelligent life. When the rebellion began, The Sergeant was put in command to protect the researchers and fight against the enemy. Things have only gotten worse day by day: conspiracies about human possession and a Demonic Entity have arisen, ever since human soldiers transformed into abominations, and exploration groups never returned from The Abyss. This is no longer a battle. This is a war between Two Sides of Hell.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel/AMD Integrated Graphics or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any dedicated Nvidia GTX/RTX or AMD RX Graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
